basics.name: Onur Uzun
basics.label: developer
basics.summary: I am deeply passionate about designing high-level, distributed, and scalable architectures and relish the opportunities to construct bulletproof systems. I am relentlessly dedicated to expanding my expertise by staying abreast with the latest technologies and best practices in the field. I enjoy working in cross-functional teams and stepping outside of my comfort zone to learn and grow. I am driven by a love of learning and a desire to make a positive impact through my work. I am excited to be a part of a team in which I can continue to grow and meaningfully contribute, while also being surrounded by like-minded individuals who share my passion for constantly improving and pushing boundaries.
